      • ScrollPanel

        public ScrollPanel(ElementManager screen,
                   com.jme3.math.Vector2f position,
                   com.jme3.math.Vector2f dimensions,
                   com.jme3.math.Vector4f resizeBorders,
                   java.lang.String defaultImg)
        Creates a new instance of the ScrollPanel control
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen control the Element is to be added to
        position - A Vector2f containing the x/y position of the Element
        dimensions - A Vector2f containing the width/height dimensions of the Element
        resizeBorders - A Vector4f containing the border information used when resizing the default image (x = N, y = W, z = E, w = S)
        defaultImg - The default image to use for the ScrollPanel's background

      • getVerticalScrollDistance

        public float getVerticalScrollDistance()
        Returns the height difference between the scrollable area's total height and the scroll panel's bounds. Note: This returns a negative float value if the scrollable area is smaller than it's bounds.
        Returns:
        height difference
